ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: so have taqwa of Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So fear God and follow me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So fear Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have fear of God and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, have Taqwa of Allah, and obey me."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore guard against (the punishment of) Allah and obey me:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I ask of you no wage for this;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So keep your duty to Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: so fear God, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So fear Allah, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So be wary of Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So fear Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So fear Allah, keep your duty to Him, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So fear Allah, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So fear God, and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So fear Allah and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:179] So fear God and obey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (So keep your duty to Allah) so fear Allah in that which He commanded you regarding repentance and faith (and obey me) and follow my way and religion.
